Package CAMs

Interface ReplyHandler

public interface ReplyHandler
Defines methods for handling replies to enquiries and viewing replies.
Since:
2023-11-25
Version:
3.0
Author:
Jeevika, Mathangi, Teja, Vikaas

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    reply(CAMs.Enquiry enquiry)
    Submits a reply to a specific enquiry.
    void
    viewRepliesToEnquiries(CAMs.Student student, List<CAMs.Camp> allCamps)
    Displays replies to enquiries submitted by a student across all camps.

  • Method Details

    • reply

      void reply(CAMs.Enquiry enquiry)
      Submits a reply to a specific enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The enquiry to which the reply is submitted.

    • viewRepliesToEnquiries

      void viewRepliesToEnquiries(CAMs.Student student, List<CAMs.Camp> allCamps)
      Displays replies to enquiries submitted by a student across all camps.
      Parameters:
      student - The student for whom replies are to be displayed.
      allCamps - The list of all camps to consider for displaying replies.
